parameters.name: PlayerId
parameters.documentation: The player the human belongs to.

parameters.name: TribeType
parameters.documentation: The type of the tribe this human belongs to. E.g. `"viking"`

parameters.name: JobType
parameters.documentation: The job the human has. E.g. `"civilist"` or `"child_male"`

parameters.name: Id
parameters.documentation: The object id which allows the human to be referenced by missions. Normally `0`.

parameters.name: Behaviour
parameters.documentation: Defines special behaviours of the human. E.g. No needs, immortal or not controllable. Number interpreted as bitfield.
